overview: Julia zu Hohenberg actually wanted to spend her wedding day on the beach in Hawaii. However, important business dealings with her husband Felix lead her to the jungles of Borneo, where the distinguished countess makes a discovery that will have consequences for her future life: the illegal clearing of large areas of forest has drastically reduced the orangutans' habitat and the animals are threatened with extinction. To make matters worse, her husband is obviously involved in the machinations of the timber mafia.
title: Verloren auf Borneo
